revised_title: Improved Method for Measuring Percentage Hemolysis and its Implications on Hemolytic Reaction Kinetics
tldr: The author presents an improved method for measuring percentage hemolysis using the "Stuphenphoto-meter" apparatus. This method allows for more accurate and precise measurements of hemolysis kinetics. The author also discovers that existing equations for the kinetics of simple hemolytic reactions need to be revised due to the curvature of isometathetic lines, which were previously expected to be parallel to the abscissa.
